name: Just Racing🚗
description:
This is a really cool racing game  

assets from Kenney

W to move forward ,A and D to turn left and right(it is top-down so sometimes look the direction ) and S to break or go backward 

The same follow to arrow keys as well

also don't forget to select the number of laps  in the training level if you set it to 0  or 1  you can go around infinitely
